subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Will Power won IndyCar’s São Paulo 300 for the third straight time, finishing ahead of Ryan Hunter Reay on the 2.5-mile, 11-turn Anhembi circuit.
snippet: Will Power won IndyCar’s São Paulo 300 for the third straight time, finishing ahead of Ryan Hunter Reay on the 2.5-mile, 11-turn Anhembi circuit.
